Head tracker module usage guide

Brief:           This module is the stm imu sensor driver implementation.
Usage:           GCC:  For STM imu sensor driver, Add the following module.mk to your makefile:
                       include $(SOURCE_DIR))/middleware/third_party/imu_stm/module.mk.
Dependency:      N/A.
Notice:          N/A
Relative doc:    N/A
Example project: N/A
